alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palm Coast, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Marineland, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
